modName: Aradia Lingerie Dress for Sevenbase Cleavage
summary: Sexy clothes for your female character
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font="Verdinia"] [color=indigo][heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading][/color] [/font]

This mod adds set that contains lingerie outfit for Sevenbase Cleavage body type.

No weight slider support.

Set is originaly UNP maded from scratch by Aradia,converted by me and posted here with Aradia's permission.

Yup.

Done wtih 3DSMax and Outfit studio[/b]

[img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3713/12176437264_44d69b61f8_c.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][b][font="Verdinia"] [color=indigo][heading]REQUIREMENTS[/heading][/color] [/font]

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?

[/b][/center]


[center][b][font="Verdinia"] [color=indigo][heading]RECOMMENDED MODS[/heading][/color] [/font]

SG Female Textures Renewal by Hello Santa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?

SG Female Eyebrows by Hello Santa
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?

SG Hair pack 268 edition
google
[/b][/center]


[center][font="Verdinia"][color=indigo][b][heading]Q&A[/heading][/b][/color][/font]

[b]Q:how to obtain?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] help Lingerie
player.additem <ID> 1

set should contain 4 parts

[b]Q: Do you going to make this CBBE/UNP/ADEC etc compatible?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Im definetly not gonna do this. Do not ask me please

[b]Q: I got clippings while <random animation>[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Looking forward for one who can fix that!

[b]Q: What mods do you use for this screenshots?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Read credits below :3

[b]Q: Can you share your savegame/preset?[/b]
[b]A:[/b] Savegame - no
Preset - maybe :>

[b]Q: Planning to add weight slider support?[/b]
[b]A: [/b]GOD NO. You can try that with Outfit Studio,but i wont accept it if _0 will have twisted objects :>
1) I prefer breast size as it is atm
2) I dont want to waste my time converting stuff to thing that im not interested
[/center]

author: Melodic
